response.original_title: The Power of Intention with Lynne McTaggart
response.overview: What happens when humanity unites with a shared purpose? Could our collective thoughts truly have the power to create a more peaceful world?  Award-winning journalist and bestselling author Lynne McTaggart takes you on a transformative journey into the science and practice of collective intention, revealing how it generates an energetic field capable of reshaping reality. The Power of Intention explores groundbreaking experiments that reveal the body’s innate capacity to heal, the ability to reduce violence in high-crime areas, and even the potential to foster peace in conflict zones. This groundbreaking documentary blends science and spirituality, redefining what we know about the nature of reality.  It doesn't stop there—you can be part of this movement. Together, we’ll rethink the boundaries of what we can accomplish with collective focus and purpose.
response.title: The Power of Intention with Lynne McTaggart
